short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dr. Stone wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Dr. Stone Anime background. Dr. Stone wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Dr. Stone wallpapers with every new tab.
2. Customize your Dr. Stone background by randomizing or favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick links to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for swift navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to more themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the extension.
14. Instant access to play games.
15. Activate dynamic effects like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Dr Stone tab.
